title: Emerald

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Every Rock will gain Powerful defense. You start with 1 charge. You gain a charge for every dead Rock.
-If you're the only rock alive, each night, pick 3 players. Target A will protect you with the value of their defense (Basic if None or lower). Target B will attack Target C with the value of their attack (Basic if None or lower)
- If you exist in the game, Odd Keystone will be rerolled to another random rock role, because Stones are not rocks, and fuck you Rasen.
